Description: List of species considered iconic in the Northeast

Description: Species conservation status from NatureServe and IUCN
Target: No marine species are at risk of extinction and all are classified as of Least Concern using The International Union for Conservation of Nature’s (IUCN) Red List of Threatened Species criteria
Source: NatureServe IUCN Red List
